channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Britcoin will not replace cash, BOE Governor Bailey says
item.description: Work has started on a digital version of the pound, dubbed Britcoin, but the BOE has yet to decide whether to launch one.

item.title: Leftists Melt Down After Washington Post Editorial Board Declines To Endorse Harris
item.description: Leftists suffered a meltdown Friday after the editors of the Washington Post announced they would no longer endorse in presidential races.

item.title: The Art of Civics

item.title: Trump earns endorsement from 'highly respected' Muslim leaders in battleground state

item.title: Wall Street’s Latest Flood: Private Credit
item.description: Private credit is a treacherous swamp full of opportunists. Is your consultant capable of defying the formidable odds of success?

item.title: US approves sale of this advanced missile defense system to Taiwan in $2 billion arms package
item.description: The potential sales package includes three National Advanced Surface-to-Air Missile Systems (NASAMS) and related equipment.

item.title: AI is being used to send some households impacted by Helene and Milton $1,000 cash relief payments
item.description: The nonprofit GiveDirectly harnesses a Google-developed AI tool to pinpoint areas with high concentrations of poverty and storm damage.

item.title: Book Review: Resistance Money: A Philosophical Case for Bitcoin

item.description: What are women's favorite alternative investments? What marketing strategies resonate with women, and which one's don't?

item.title: Trump, Stefanik campaign for vulnerable NY Republicans as Big Apple kicks off early voting
item.description: Former President Trump is campaigning for vulnerable New York Republicans Saturday night at a rally alongside GOP Conference Chair Elise Stefanik.

item.description: Over two-thirds of mafia infiltrations are in the construction, trade, real estate and manufacturing sectors.

item.title: Trump vows at Pennsylvania rally to slash energy costs, lift LNG pause and 'frack, frack, frack'

item.title: Progressives Have Created the Climate Anxiety That Is Breaking Kids’ Brains
item.description: The Left wants to blame Republicans for the environmentalism-induced mental-health woes afflicting many young people.

item.title: Trump, Harris tied with 49% each in new national Emerson poll
item.description: The latest poll shows a slight change from early October, when Harris had 50% support among likely voters compared with Trump’s 48%.
